mapper.insert: insert into pcac_merchant_compared_investigation_detail (detail_id, batch_no, code, name, legal_name, create_time, investigation_id) values (#{detailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{investigationId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update pcac_merchant_compared_investigation_detail set batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_name = #{legalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, investigation_id = #{investigationId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where detail_id = #{detailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select detail_id, batch_no, code, name, legal_name, create_time, investigation_id from pcac_merchant_compared_investigation_detail
